|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The manual specifies the following.. *'''Transmit Power''' **802.11b: typically 16dBm **802.11g: typically 14dBm **802.11n: typically 13dBm *'''Receiver Sensitivity''' **802.11b: typically -84dBm **802.11n: typically -73dBm **802.11n: typically -68dBm The manual's HTTP interface shows the device with an 00:08:54 ('''Netronix''') OUI. '''Netronix''' is presumed to be the OEM. ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Firmware=== ====v1.02==== =====binwalk dump=====
